description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Apple & Smoked Almond Crumble Sundaes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Apple & Smoked Almond Crumble Sundaes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: vanilla bean ice-cream and caramel syrup (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a barbecue on high heat. Place apple, cut-sides up, on grill, close barbecue lid and cook for 10 minutes or until softened slightly.
Brush cut sides of apple with half the butter and scatter over sugar. Turn and cook for a further 1 minute or until charred. Transfer to a plate and allow to cool slightly.
Combine remaining butter, oats, almonds and wafers in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high, stirring every 20 seconds, for 11/2 minutes.
Place three-quarters of the crumble in serving bowls. Top with apples and ice-cream. Scatter over remaining crumble, drizzle over syrup and serve.
